name: LinkedOut (Christopher Viquez)
description:
Have you ever wondered what it's like being a Hiring Manager?

Now's your chance to take the lead and hire some employees to come work for Politica, a political science founded organization. Review applications, send messages to applicants, conduct video interviews, and wave the final judge hammer. Will you be "moving forward" with their applications?

(Heavily inspired by LinkedIn)

Made specifically for the Quinnipiac Game Developers Club eJam 2020!  

Enjoy!
